Nancy Pelosi: s visit to Chinatown in San Francisco on February 24th, 2020.
The purpose of Pelosi: s visit was to support the neighborhood's businesses, particularly restaurants and shops.
Pelosi: s visit occurred three weeks before shelter-in-place restrictions were implemented in the Bay Area.
President Trump: s claim that Pelosi urged foreign nationals to "bring your infection" to Chinatown is false and unsupported by any evidence.
